wikipedia_page.main: Robert A. Innes (23 July 1878 – 1959) was a Scottish professional footballer of the early twentieth century.  Born in Lanark, he played for Notts County and Nottingham Forest between 1901 and 1905, and made a total of 71 appearances in The Football League.

response: * Bob Innes (New Zealand footballer), New Zealand international football (soccer) player
* Bob Innes (New Zealand footballer), former association football player who represented New Zealand
* Bob Innes (Scottish footballer) (1878–1959), Scottish association football player
